data.quote: The secret of change is to focus all of your energy not on fighting the old, but building the new
data.author: Socrates

data.quote: If you think education is expensive, ignorance cost you more.
data.author: Robert Gene

data.quote: You will never speak to anyone more than you speak to yourself in your head. Be kind to yourself.
data.author: Anonymus

data.quote: Don't aim for perfecton. Aim for 'Better than yesterday'.
data.author: Anonymus

data.quote: Happiness is not the absence of difficulties. Happines belongs to those who retain invicible courage and unshakable hope in the face of any challenge or adversity.
data.author: Daisaku Ikeda
